note.p: Birth: Toxteth Park, Liverpool, England (30 April 1789)
Death: Lauderdale House, Highgate, London (07 May 1871)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1871-1872 vol 20 pp i-iii signed by C T
References: J Edmund White, 'The Priestley Memorial Volume' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 85-96
R W Jones, 'Dalton's unfortunate choice' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 15-33
